mapper.select: select a.user_account,count(1) as note_share_count from if_record_fd_nm a where a.deleted_flag='0' and a.user_account is not null and a.year = #{year,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.month=#{month,jdbcType=BIGINT} and exists (select 1 from if_record_fd_cr b where b.deleted_flag='0' and b.user_account is not null and b.year = #{year,jdbcType=BIGINT} and b.month=#{month,jdbcType=BIGINT} and a.book_name = b.book_name and a.user_account = b.user_account) group by a.user_account
